short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Fresh, Bible-centered confession on every new tab. Stay inspired and rooted in faith throughout your day.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
HolyTab brings a fresh, Bible-centered confession to every new tab you open. Designed to help you stay inspired and grounded in faith throughout your day, this extension presents a daily affirmation drawn from powerful Bible verses. Whether you're seeking encouragement, peace, or spiritual strength, HolyTab offers a constant reminder of God's promises.

HolyTab also offers light and dark themes, allowing you to personalize your experience for both day and night use. Switch between themes to ensure your new tab page fits your preference, all while keeping the focus on spiritual growth.

Key Features:
Daily Bible Confessions: Get a new Bible-centered affirmation every time you open a new tab.
Light & Dark Themes: Choose between light and dark themes for a personalized, comfortable browsing experience.
Simple & Minimalistic: A distraction-free experience with beautiful typography and design.
Faith-Focused: Stay connected to your spiritual roots while browsing the internet.
Let HolyTab remind you of God's love and power with every new tab. Let your faith guide you, even in the digital world.
